title: Minidoka National Historic Site: Photos & Multimedia
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia         A view of the reconstructed Honor Roll on display at Minidoka. NPS Photo  When visiting a National Park, the Leave No Trace ethic, "Take only pictures, leave only footprints" holds particularly true; and many visitors, after leaving here with memories and pictures, are eager to share them with friends, family, and the world. Join us as we add more memories and photos.
